identified-content.object.title: Advertising (Times Column)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Marketing, Advertising and PR

abstract.p: Frank Lowe settles legal dispute with Interpublic Group of Companies; suit involved Lowe's opening of London agency Red Brick Road, whose first account was retail giant Tesco; Lowe is retired founder of Interpublic's Lowe & Partners Worldwide (S)

block.p: Frank Lowe, the retired founder of Lowe & Partners Worldwide, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies, and Interpublic settled a legal dispute between them stemming from his opening a London agency, Red Brick Road, whose first account was a large Lowe client, the Tesco retail chain. Interpublic withdrew a claim against Mr. Lowe filed with the American Arbitration Association and he withdrew a lawsuit for defamation against Interpublic filed in New York State Supreme Court. Further terms of the settlement were not disclosed.

Interpublic withdrew a claim against Mr. Lowe filed with the American Arbitration Association and he withdrew a lawsuit for defamation against Interpublic filed in New York State Supreme Court. Further terms of the settlement were not disclosed.
